INSERT INTO genes (gene_id, gene_name, function) VALUES (1, 'ABC', 'Function 1') ON CONFLICT (gene_id) DO UPDATE SET gene_name = 'ABC', function = 'Function 1';
INSERT INTO proteins (protein_id, protein_name, molecular_weight) VALUES (1, 'ProteinA', 100.50) ON CONFLICT (protein_id) DO UPDATE SET protein_name = 'ProteinA', molecular_weight = 100.50;

INSERT INTO research_projects (project_id, project_name, project_description, start_date, end_date) VALUES ('1b9d6bcd-bbfd-4b2d-9b5d-ab8dfbbd4bef', 'Project A', 'Research project A description', '2023-01-15', '2023-07-30') ON CONFLICT (project_id) DO UPDATE SET project_name = 'Project A', project_description = 'Updated description', start_date = '2023-01-15', end_date = '2023-07-30';

INSERT INTO researchers (researcher_id, researcher_name, expertise, email) VALUES ('2f6d11d4-63f6-451e-95e0-4865a917a24f', 'John Doe', 'Computer Science', 'john.doe@example.com') ON CONFLICT (researcher_id) DO UPDATE SET researcher_name = 'John Doe', expertise = 'Updated expertise', email = 'john.doe@example.com';
